item.title: Open Letter to French Foreign Office Minister Catherine Colonna, French Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary, Consul General Guillaume Roy, forwarded to Ambassador Burns and U.S. Attorney General Merrick Garland
item.description: Date sent: December 11, 2023, 13:53 (China Standard Time) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11_1353_0800_open_letter_to_colonna_lortholary_Redacted.pdf On LinkedIn: On X (Twitter): I am publicly sharing an open letter addressed to French Foreign Affairs Minister Catherine Colonna (@MinColonna), Ambassador to China Bertrand Lortholary (@BLortholary), and Consul General Guillaume ROY. This letter concerns a deeply serious matter: the possibility of beingâ€¦ pic.twitter.com/iuTu24tC1n — Vincent B. Le Corre (@VincentBLeCorre) December 11, 2023
